review_data.title: Einfach super dieser Burger!!
review_data.content: Habe schon viele Burger gegessen! Aber keiner war so gut wie die vom Horber. Einfach gut Fleisch, Fritten die Bedienung...More

review_data.title: Bester Burger der Stadt zu einem guten Preis
review_data.content: Die Burger schmecken immer sensationell! Das Geheimnis scheint schlichtweg die Fleischqualität zu sein. Die Pommes sind sehr dünn, was ich...More

review_data.title: Probably best burger in town
review_data.content: Prior to this place there was Bürgermeister burgers. That place was at some point ranked number 1 on TripAdvisor. Well Horber practically did not change the recipe

review_data.title: Best Burger
review_data.content: Sehr köstlicher, frisch zubereiteter Burger! Man merkt die gute Qualität des Fleisches. War sicher nicht mein letzter Besuch.

review_data.title: The restaurant is Open!
review_data.content: Just check the address: Langstrasse 238, Zürich. Burgers are simply great. French fries are too short, i must ask if they have country fries... However definitely 5 points for this great meat and very good price (considering Swiss standards).

review_data.title: Excelente
review_data.content: Localizado no subsolo da estação principal de trem de Zurique (HB Bahnhof) oferece lanches rápidos baseados em salsichas e hambúrgueres....More

review_data.title: Köstliche Chiliwurst
review_data.content: Gute Würste, wie man sie vom Metzger erwarten kann. Ich war schon paar Mal dort und war nie enttäuscht.

review_data.title: Best Sausage in town.....
review_data.content: Grosse Auswahl, grosse Würste genauso wie sie sein müssen... Heiss und gut gegrillt aus eigener Herstellung... Super lecker... Preis.... Ist...More

review_data.title: Best sausage
review_data.content: Accidentally passed through it and stopped by because it was crowded. And we're glad we did it because they serve very tasty sausage. It maybe the best sausage in zurich We tried pork sausage, beef sausage and curry sausage. They serve it with spicy sauce,...More

review_data.title: Niederdorfstrasse jewel and astronomic haven
review_data.content: Horner is a small chain of Wurste & Burli (sausage & roll) stand-up fast food; this one is in Neiderdorfstrasse which is a butt-kicking party zone in Zurich's old college and trades district. I like to go here when out on the town as well...More
